articles.description: However, if it gets into Earth’s gravity trap in 2029, it will have more chances to ram our planet in 2036
articles.content: MOSCOW, July 28. /TASS/. Asteroid 2009 PQ1, which will fly past Earth in August 2020, will pose no threat to our planet, Vice President of the Russian Academy of Sciences, astrophysicist Yuri Balega,… [+1166 chars]
